prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small sea creature with brown and purple hues.
I want a Pokemon that blends into its aquatic surroundings, showcasing shades of brown and blue.
Generate a Pokemon with a serpentine body shape, featuring distinctive fins and a unique color pattern.
Make a creature that thrives in wetlands, sporting a combination of earthy tones and vibrant accents.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a playful demeanor, with colors that mimic the depths of the ocean.
Design a small aquatic Pokemon with a whimsical appearance, primarily in dark brown with hints of purple.
Show me a Pokemon that captures the essence of a river environment, characterized by its unique coloration and shape.
